data.meanings: to punish, accuse, develop hate, revenge, persecute, find fault, disapprove, dislike with tongue or punishment.
data.sentence: The word مُنْتَقِمُونَ comes from the root ن ق م and is associated with the meanings: to punish, accuse, develop hate, revenge, persecute, find fault, disapprove, dislike with tongue or punishment.

data.meanings: to go, go away, depart, take away or go away with, consume, receive, pass along, die, be ended.Opinion, belief, way of action, rite. Hold an opinion, follow the opinion of, hold a belief, adapt an opinion.Gold.
data.sentence: The word نَذْهَبَنَّ comes from the root ذ ه ب and is associated with the meanings: to go, go away, depart, take away or go away with, consume, receive, pass along, die, be ended.Opinion, belief, way of action, rite. Hold an opinion, follow the opinion of, hold a belief, adapt an opinion.Gold.
